When an adjustable bed frame is adjusted, the base of the frame can be raised or lowered into a variety of positions to better support specific areas of your body, thus adding convenience and comfortability. Using a remote control or app on some models, you can adjust the position of both the head and foot sections independently.

Here are common features in adjustable beds that make them appealing:

1. Enhanced Comfort: By raising your head or legs slightly above your heart level, it reduces stress on your cardiovascular system and provides relief from muscle soreness.

2. Reduced Acid Reflux: Elevating the head has been shown to reduce symptoms associated with acid reflux.

3. Improved Circulation & Pressure Relief: Raising either end promotes blood circulation by reducing pressure points around specific parts of our body like hips, shoulders neck

4. Assistance for Mobility Issues: People who have difficulty getting out of bed due to arthritis or other conditions may benefit as they can raise their upper body to help with lifting themselves out.

5- Customizability & Convenience: Adjustable beds allow users to customize sleep experiences based off how one feels each night-time due sky-high levels freedom ecitytricity usage settings tailored specifically ourselves

6- Reduces Snoring/Sleep Apnea - Elevation helps open up airways facilitating better breathing patterns which could leads fewer instances wherein persons experiencing obstructive events while unconscious (iude apneic episodes).

7- Accommodates Different Sleep Styles - Offering varying incline options ideal if partners prefer sleeping styles where separate comfortable zones need exist (+takes cater different preferences).
  
8-Pain management - For those suffering chronic pain issues such sciatica/, certain adjustments offer restful nights leave waking feeling refreshed+
